title: Chapter XVI - Real Property Tax Administration
content:
Chapter XVI - Real Property Tax Administration

State Regulations

Part 8185 - General Administration (Subpart 8185-0 to 8185-1)

Part 8186 - State Equalization Rates, Ratios And Adjustments (Subpart 8186-1 to 8186-26)

Part 8187 - Informational Hearings, Adjudicatory Proceedings And Review Proceedings (Subpart 8187-1 to 8187-2)

Part 8188 - Minimum Qualification Standards, Training And Certification Of Local Assessment Administration Personnel (Subpart 8188-1 to 8188-8)

Part 8189 - Preparation And Maintenance Of Tax Maps For Real Property Assessment And Taxation Administration (ยง 8189.2 to 8189.22)

Part 8190 - Assessment Rolls (Subpart 8190-1 to 8190-3)

Part 8191 - Real Property Transfers (Subpart 8191-1 to 8191-4)

Part 8193 - Assessor's Reports (Subpart 8193-4)

Part 8194 - Agricultural Assessments (ยง 8194.1 to 8194.2)

Part 8195 - Advisory Appraisals (Subpart 8195-1 to 8195-2)

Part 8196 - Assessment Of Oil And Gas Economic Units (ยง 8196.1 to 8196.3)

Part 8197 - Special Franchise Assessment (Subpart 8197-2 to 8197-5)

Part 8199 - Procedures For The Assessment Of Taxable State Lands (Subpart 8199-2 to 8199-9)

Part 8200 - Railroad Ceilings (Subpart 8200-1 to 8200-7)

Part 8201 - State Assistance For The Maintenance Of A System Of Improved Real Property Tax Administration (Subpart 8201-3)

Part 8300 - Capital Local Expenditures for School District's Share of Additional Budgeted Capital Local Expenditures Made by a Board of Cooperative Educational Services (ยง 8300.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
